channel.title: Obby Maul Pure
channel.description:
Well basically the title describes it all, and if you are not familiar with an "Obby Maul Pure" then the stats are usually about 60str+ everything else 1 not including hitpoints, which may vary. The average combat level is anywhere from 32 to mid 40s.
So my problem is that I'm not very good at this obby mauling thing as I'm new to it. So what obby maulers usually do is use a small weapon then switch to obby maul for a high hit ko at random.
Any suggestions for a small weapon (secondary)? Right now I'm on bone dagger p++ and it's not working out for me.

item.title: Obby Maul Pure
item.dc:creator: @SCFTW SCFTW
item.description:
@SCFTW wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:461229”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=564157.msg4108997#msg4108997 date=1348343397]
Let’s watch the playercount drop radically once it gets released.
[/quote]eoc is fun on low level accounts but it doesn’t appeal to me as a higher level for some odd reason[/quote]

Jagex is trying their best to make EOC enjoyable to everyone.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

EOC is horrible. I can’t even kill anyone because they manage to 1 hit me and I can’t work out how much stronger someone is than me (no way to see own combat level?)
